page.title: 08THE PEOPLE OF OFFLEY
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire to all the householders in our area; about 25% of them were returned and from these returns we have drawn our data. Approximately 24% of the population are under 16 years of age, 16% are between 16-30 years old, 30% are between 30-50 years old, 19% are between 50-70 years old and 10.5% are over 70 years old. 54% of the adult population are employed, 12% are out of work, 30.5% are retired and 3% semi-retired. At least 70 different occupations include a Law Commissioner, a journalist, farm workers, teachers, local government officials, a museum curator, motor mechanics, domestic workers, accountants, secretaries, publicans and salesmen. 55% drive to work in their cars, 15% travel on the bus, 7% drive to Hitchin
